sortId.title: Identifier for the specific sort operation
sortId.description: Has to be unique if there are multiple sorts on the pipeline.

comparisonExpression.title: Expression to compare two events
comparisonExpression.description: The expression can access the events via the 'left' and 'right' properties.

topN.title: The amount of events to return sorted
topN.description: Limits the output to N (highest/lowest) events

maxEvents.title: The maximum number of events in input
maxEvents.description: Specifies the number of events that can flow into this function

suppressPreviews.title: Disable intermediate results
suppressPreviews.description: Disables the generation of intermediate results when true
